mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, temp_id, bfc_id, bfc_name, item_code, item_id, item_name, num, num_unit_code, spec, phar_id, usage_code, use_code, prep_code, dosage, dosage_unit_code, rate_id, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from oper_account_temp_detail where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into oper_account_temp_detail(hosp_code, temp_id, bfc_id, bfc_name, item_code, item_id, item_name, num, num_unit_code, spec, phar_id, usage_code, use_code, prep_code, dosage, dosage_unit_code, rate_id, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{hospCode}, #{tempId}, #{bfcId}, #{bfcName}, #{itemCode}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{num}, #{numUnitCode}, #{spec}, #{pharId}, #{usageCode}, #{useCode}, #{prepCode}, #{dosage}, #{dosageUnitCode}, #{rateId}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})

insert into oper_account_temp_detail(id, hosp_code, temp_id, bfc_id, bfc_name, item_code, item_id, item_name, num, num_unit_code, spec, phar_id, usage_code, use_code, prep_code, dosage, dosage_unit_code, rate_id, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values
(#{dto.id}, #{dto.hospCode}, #{dto.tempId}, #{dto.bfcId}, #{dto.bfcName}, #{dto.itemCode}, #{dto.itemId}, #{dto.itemName}, #{dto.num}, #{dto.numUnitCode}, #{dto.spec}, #{dto.pharId}, #{dto.usageCode}, #{dto.useCode}, #{dto.prepCode}, #{dto.dosage}, #{dto.dosageUnitCode}, #{dto.rateId}, #{dto.crteId}, #{dto.crteName}, #{dto.crteTime})
mapper.update:
update oper_account_temp_detail
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
temp_id = #{tempId},
bfc_id = #{bfcId},
bfc_name = #{bfcName},
item_code = #{itemCode},
item_id = #{itemId},
item_name = #{itemName},
num = #{num},
num_unit_code = #{numUnitCode},
spec = #{spec},
phar_id = #{pharId},
usage_code = #{usageCode},
use_code = #{useCode},
prep_code = #{prepCode},
dosage = #{dosage},
dosage_unit_code = #{dosageUnitCode},
rate_id = #{rateId},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from oper_account_temp_detail where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id = #{id}
